articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: EU delays approval of Novavax's revised COVID vaccine - Reuters
articles.description: European Union (EU) regulators have delayed a decision to give approval for Novavax's (NVAX.O) variant-tailored COVID-19 vaccine, the company said on Sunday.
articles.content:
Oct 15 (Reuters) - European Union (EU) regulators have delayed a decision to give approval for Novavax's (NVAX.O) variant-tailored COVID-19 vaccine, the company said on Sunday.
